TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridPagerStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle
Public NotInheritable Class DataGridPagerStyle Inherits TableItemStyle

summary.span: 指定 控制項的頁面巡覽區樣式。

span.span: Specifies the style for the pager of the control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面巡覽區是項目上啟用可讓您連結至其他頁面的分頁的控制項。The pager is an element on the control that allows you to link to other pages when paging is enabled. 屬性控制項使用這個類別的執行個體來代表頁面巡覽區的樣式屬性。The property of the control uses an instance of this class to represent the style properties for the pager. 如需有關分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和。For more information on paging, see and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件來代表中頁面巡覽區項目的樣式屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to represent the style of the pager element in the property. 物件集的顯示模式和分頁的項目對齊。The object sets the display mode and alignment of the paging element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Copies the style of the specified object into this instance of the class.

summary.span: 將指定 物件的樣式與 類別的這個執行個體合併。

span.span: Merges the style of the specified object with this instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來結合指定的樣式屬性物件與這個執行個體的類別。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with this instance of the class. 來自這個執行個體的屬性已設定的值，如果屬性是不變。If a property from this instance is already set to a value, the property is unchanged. 如果未設定屬性，則這個方法會設定該屬性與值的對應屬性從物件。If a property is not set, this method sets that property with the value from the corresponding property of the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來結合屬性物件物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the properties of a object with a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode Mode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定頁面巡覽區項目是否顯示連結至上下頁的按鈕，或直接連接至頁面的數值按鈕。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the pager element displays buttons that link to the next and previous page, or numeric buttons that link directly to a page.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，以指定哪一個設定頁面巡覽區按鈕上使用控制項。Use the property to specify which set of pager buttons to use on the control. 您可以指定按鈕連結至下一步] 和 [上一個頁面上，或直接連接至頁面的數值按鈕。You can specify buttons that link to the next and previous page, or numeric buttons that link directly to a page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的頁面巡覽區項目會顯示為連結至上下頁的按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager element is displayed as buttons that link to the next and previous page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NextPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NextPageText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於移往下一頁按鈕的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next page button.

value.span: 顯示於下一頁按鈕的文字。

span.span: The text to display for the next page button.

value.span: 預設值是，這會轉譯為大於符號 (>)。

span.span: The default value is , which is rendered as the greater than sign (>).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性設為 [下一頁] 按鈕提供自訂的文字。Use the property to provide custom text for the next page button. 屬性必須設為`PagerMode.NextPrev`這個屬性，才能發生效用。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NextPrev` for this property to have any effect. 這個屬性用連同屬性上建立一組自訂的下一頁和上一頁按鈕的頁面巡覽區控制項控制項。This property is used along with the property to create a custom set of controls for the next and previous buttons of the pager on the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML 的特殊字元。This property does not automatically encode special characters to HTML. 您需要將這些字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值。You need to convert these characters to the appropriate HTML value. 例如大於符號 (>) 不會自動轉換成`>`。For example the greater than sign (>) will not automatically convert to `>`. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂的頁面巡覽區項目的 [下一步] 頁面瀏覽按鈕的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the next page navigation button of the pager element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PageButtonCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PageButtonCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定數值按鈕的數目，以在 控制項的頁面巡覽區項目中同時顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control.

value.span: 要在 控制項的頁面巡覽區項目中，同時顯示的數值按鈕的數目。

span.span: The number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的頁面巡覽區項目中同時顯示的數值按鈕的數目控制項。Use the property to specify the number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control. 屬性必須設為`PagerMode.NumericPages`這個屬性，才能發生效用。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NumericPages` for this property to have any effect. 如果有更多的頁面中控制比指定在這個屬性中，省略符號按鈕 （...） 會顯示在頁面巡覽區項目。If there are more pages in the control than specified in this property, ellipsis buttons (...) are displayed in the pager element. 按一下時，這些按鈕會顯示下一個或前一組數值的按鈕。When clicked, these buttons display the next or previous set of numeric buttons. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中的頁面巡覽區項目，同時顯示五個數值頁面按鈕控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display five numeric page buttons concurrently in the pager element of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The selected value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition Position { System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition value); };
member this.Position : System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerPosition with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在 控制項中頁面巡覽區項目的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the pager element in the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定的位置的頁面巡覽區項目會顯示在控制項。Use the property to specify the location where the pager element is displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽區項目可以顯示的上緣的下邊緣，或在兩個的上限和下限邊緣控制項。The pager element can be displayed at the upper edge, the lower edge, or at both the upper and lower edges of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定頁面巡覽區會顯示在上邊緣的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager is displayed at the upper edge of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於移往上一頁按鈕的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous page button.

value.span: 顯示於上一頁按鈕的文字。

span.span: The text to display for the previous page button.

value.span: 預設值是，這會轉譯為小於符號 (<)。

span.span: The default value is , which is rendered as the less than sign (<).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性設為 [下一頁] 按鈕提供自訂的文字。Use the property to provide custom text for the next page button. 屬性必須設為`PagerMode.NextPrev`這個屬性，才能發生效用。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NextPrev` for this property to have any effect. 這個屬性用連同屬性上建立自訂的頁面巡覽區的 [下一步] 和 [上一個] 按鈕的外觀控制項。This property is used along with the property to create a custom appearance for the next and previous buttons of the pager on the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML 的特殊字元。This property does not automatically encode special characters to HTML. 您需要將特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值。You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value. 例如，大於符號 (>) 不會自動轉換成`>`。For example, the greater than sign (>) will not automatically convert to `>`. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂的頁面巡覽區項目為前一頁瀏覽按鈕的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the previous page navigation button of the pager element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
